articlesectionclassifier.util
Class TextTokeniser

java.lang.Object
  articlesectionclassifier.util.TextTokeniser

public class TextTokeniser
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class that provides a series of normalised tokens for analysis by the ArticleSectionClassifier class. A new object must be created for each piece of text. You can iterate through the tokens using: TextTokeniser tokeniser = new TextTokeniser("these words will be tokenised"); while ( tokeniser.hasMoreTokens() ) { String token = tokeniser.nextToken(); ..do someting with token.. } Or you can use getAllTokens() or getAllUniqueTokens() to retrieve all the tokens at once as a String typed LinkedList (i.e. LinkedList<String>).
